display_long_description:
Game Shutdown because there are too many bugs and the owner (me) is revamping the game.

Welcome to ManMan’s Nextbots — where the hallways never end, the lights flicker for no reason, and meme-fueled monsters will absolutely ruin your day.

Dive into a VR horror-fan game inspired by Gorilla Tag and the chaos of Nextbots. Run through eerie liminal spaces with nothing but your gorilla arms and questionable decision-making skills. Whether you’re exploring backrooms, parking garages, or strangely silent malls, one thing’s for sure: something very loud and very fast is right behind you.
 Key Features:

Intense Nextbot chases powered by NavMesh AI

Gorilla-style VR locomotion for maximum panic flailing

Events that swap out all the Nextbots with even angrier ones (hi Angry Monchi 👋)

Jumpscares that freeze you in place like your Wi-Fi just cut out

Multiplayer chaos 

This game is scary. This game is funny. This game is a fever dream.

Can you survive the bots, the jumpscares, and your own bad decisions?
